text: Goa Praja Party (GPP) is a regional political party in Goa.Parrty was founded by Pandurang Raut and Prakash Fadte. Former Goa MLAs announce formation of new political party It is led by Pandurang Raut The Goa Praja Party allied with the Shiv Sena, Maharashtrawadi Gomantak Party and the Goa Suraksha Manch to contest the 2017 Goa Legislative Assembly election.http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/goa/gpp-warns-gsm-about- keeping-ties-with-mgp/articleshow/56301700.cmshttp://digitalgoa.com/shiv-sena- gsm-goa-praja-party-to-be-in-alliance-for-2017-goa-polls/ The alliance contested in 33 out of the total 40 constituencies.https://thewire.in/104926/goa-polls/ ==References== Category:Political parties in Goa Category:Indian Hindu political parties Category:Maharashtrawadi Gomantak Party Category:Political parties established in 2015 Category:2015 establishments in India Category:Regionalist parties in India Category:Political parties in India
title: Goa Praja Party
